Set up your e-commerce site now with a free demo, powerful modules, and innovative technologies. Step into the future of commerce!

Achieving success in the e-commerce industry has never been easier! Turkey's leading e-commerce platform is here to grow your business with innovative technologies and user-friendly features. Whether you're a startup or a global brand, we offer customized solutions for guaranteed success.

profile.bannerSubtitle: Discover the Power of Technology with Krum Technology
profile.bannerDescription: At Krum Technology, we provide innovative solutions that push the boundaries of technology and aim to meet our customers' needs in the best possible way. With our strong infrastructure, reliable service approach, and customer-focused mindset, we stand by our business partners in both local and global markets.
profile.visionDescription1: At Krum Technology, our vision is to lead businesses through their technological transformation processes in an increasingly digital world, preparing them not only for today‚Äôs competitive environment but also for the challenges of tomorrow. With our innovative solutions, we empower companies by strengthening their digital infrastructure and enabling them to achieve sustainable growth.We see technology not merely as a tool, but as a strategic force that reshapes business processes, enhances efficiency, and elevates the customer experience to the highest level. With this perspective, we guide businesses from all sectors on their digitalization journey and help them thrive in the future.Our vision is to add value not only to large enterprises but also to small and medium-sized businesses by turning them into strong and effective players in the digital economy. By adopting an innovation-driven approach, we aim to create lasting impact in the business world through reliable, accessible, and sustainable technology solutions.
profile.visionDescription2: We see technology not just as a tool but as a strategic force transforming the business world. Guided by this perspective, we continue to develop innovative solutions in areas such as artificial intelligence, big data, cloud computing, and automation.
profile.visionDescription3: Our vision is to add value to businesses of all sizes through technology, make them a strong part of the digital economy, and guide them in turning into a success story from national to global markets.
profile.missionDescription: Our core mission is to support the growth of our clients' businesses by providing reliable infrastructure solutions and innovative services‚Äînot only helping them optimize their current operations but also empowering them to achieve their long-term goals. We aim to make technology accessible and sustainable across all areas of business, enabling companies to strengthen their competitive edge and advance confidently on their digital transformation journey. By gaining a deep understanding of our clients' unique needs, we strive to deliver tailored solutions that elevate their businesses to the next level.
profile.teamTitle: Our Team and Areas of Expertise
profile.teamDescription: Krum Technology has a team of the most talented professionals in the industry. Our team's priority is to understand your business needs and provide the most suitable solutions.

etrade.bannerTitle: Unlock the Gates to the Global Market with E-Commerce
etrade.bannerSubtitle: Step into the Global Market with E-Commerce
etrade.bannerDescription: The world is experiencing the era of digitalization, which is rapidly eliminating borders. Thanks to E-Commerce, you can increase your income by making your business accessible globally and without any local differences. With the right strategies and a strong infrastructure, it is now very easy to reach your products from all over the world. Come, we are developing what we can do to globalize.

whyCards.title: Expand to the Global Market
whyCards.desc: Reach customers around the world through digital channels.

whyCards.title: Brand Awareness
whyCards.desc: Increase your online visibility and reach more users.

whyCards.title: Foreign Currency Revenue
whyCards.desc: Convert your earnings into foreign currency by selling abroad.

whyCards.title: Customer Base
whyCards.desc: Accelerate your growth by reaching new customer groups.

whyCards.title: Competitive Advantage
whyCards.desc: Stand out from competitors and gain a strong market position.

etrade.advantagesDescription: E-Commerce offers unique advantages to businesses. Here are some reasons to choose this business model:

advantagesCards.title: Global Reach
advantagesCards.desc: You can deliver your products all around the world. Thanks to advanced cargo integrations, you can deliver your products quickly.

advantagesCards.title: Cost Advantage
advantagesCards.desc: Unlike traditional replacement, sales can be made to vehicle organizations and physical stores with less expansion in the warehouse.

advantagesCards.title: 24/7 Sales Opportunity
advantagesCards.desc: Your e-commerce site is open 24 hours a day. In this way, you can reach parts in different time zones.

advantagesCards.title: Brand Power
advantagesCards.desc: Being present in the international market takes your brand one step further. You can establish a strong bond with different individuals.

solutionsList.title: Multi-Language and Currency
solutionsList.desc: Your customers can shop in their own language and currency. It provides ease through automatic currency conversion and secure payments.

solutionsList.title: Logistics and Cargo Integrations
solutionsList.desc: We offer full integration with global logistics companies like DHL, UPS, and FedEx. Easily track orders and enhance customer satisfaction.

solutionsList.title: Local Payment Systems
solutionsList.desc: Thanks to our infrastructure compatible with systems like PayPal and Stripe, your customers can securely complete their payments.

solutionsList.title: Tax and Customs Management
solutionsList.desc: The system automatically handles tax and customs procedures required for E-Commerce. This ensures legal compliance and simplifies operations.

solutionsList.title: Marketing and SEO Support
solutionsList.desc: Promote your products and brand in global markets through international SEO, social media integration, and advertising support.

digital.bannerTitle: Grow Your Business with Our Digital Marketing Services
digital.bannerSubtitle: Reach More Customers with Digital Marketing
digital.bannerDescription: In the digital age, the secret to a successful business lies in an effective digital marketing strategy. At Krum Technology, we offer comprehensive digital marketing services to help your business stand out online, expand your audience, and increase your sales.
digital.powerDesc1: Digital marketing is a strategic bridge that connects your brand to your target audience in the most effective way. Unlike traditional marketing methods, digital marketing offers unique advantages such as understanding customer behavior, making data-driven decisions, delivering personalized content, and maximizing conversion rates.
digital.powerDesc2: At Krum Technology, we understand that every business has unique needs. That‚Äôs why we develop flexible and measurable digital marketing strategies tailored specifically to your goals and industry.
digital.powerDesc3: Our solutions do more than just increase your visibility ‚Äî they enhance brand recognition, strengthen customer loyalty, and deliver real, measurable outcomes. From social media management and search engine optimization to content marketing and retargeting campaigns, we manage every channel effectively to help you stay ahead in the digital landscape.
digital.audience_title: Know Your Audience and Reach Them Effectively
digital.audience_content:
An effective digital marketing strategy is not limited to just producing content or running ads. Real success begins with deeply understanding your target audience and turning that knowledge into a strategic advantage. To make your brand stand out in the digital world, we first analyze who your customers are, what they‚Äôre interested in, which platforms they use, and their purchasing behavior in detail.

With our data-driven approaches, we base marketing processes not on intuition, but on powerful insights. We track user behavior in real time, interpret the data, and continuously improve targeting. This way, we not only reach broad audiences but also connect with high-potential individuals in the most effective way.

Through advanced segmentation techniques, personalized campaigns, and multi-channel engagement strategies, we strengthen your digital presence. We make every touchpoint meaningful, enhance the customer experience, and increase loyalty.

services.title: SEO (Search Engine Optimization)
services.desc: We ensure your website ranks high in search engines. We increase your organic traffic through keyword research, content optimization, and technical SEO efforts.

services.title: PPC Ad Management
services.desc: We create effective advertising campaigns on Google, Facebook, Instagram, and other platforms. We maximize your return on investment (ROI) by reducing your cost per click.

services.title: Social Media Management
services.desc: We professionally manage your brand's social media accounts.We increase your engagement through content creation, community

services.title: Email Marketing
services.desc: We create effective email campaigns that reach your target audience.We help you build a loyal customer base and increase sales through remarketing strategies.

services.title: Content Marketing
services.desc: We increase your brand's authority through blog posts, video content, e-books, and more.We create original content that will engage your target audience.

services.title: Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO)
services.desc: We conduct data analytics and A/B testing to increase the conversion rates of your website and digital ads.

services.title: Digital Strategy & Consulting
services.desc: We develop digital marketing strategies specifically for your business.Our expert team creates a roadmap to help you achieve your business goals.

whyReasons.title: Data-Driven Approach
whyReasons.desc: All our strategies are based on data analytics, enabling you to achieve measurable results.

whyReasons.title: Expert Team
whyReasons.desc: Our digital marketing experts leverage the latest industry trends and techniques to take your business one step further.

whyReasons.title: Full Integration
whyReasons.desc: Your digital marketing campaigns work in complete harmony with your e-commerce platforms and CRM systems.

whyReasons.title: Customer-Centric
whyReasons.desc: We focus on understanding your target audience and developing solutions tailored to their needs.

whyReasons.title: Comprehensive Service
whyReasons.desc: We meet all your digital marketing needs, from SEO and social media to content marketing and conversion optimization.

processSteps.desc: We analyze your business's current status and goals. We define your target audience and create a strategic plan.
We develop a digital marketing strategy tailored to your industry and needs.
We implement activities such as advertising campaigns, SEO efforts, and content creation.
We regularly monitor campaign performance and optimize for maximum results.

accordionSections.title: 1. Own Your Customer Data
accordionSections.summary: Integrate data into your business and secure it.

accordionSections.title: 3. Dynamic Updates
accordionSections.summary: Update segments based on user behavior.

accordionSections.title: 4. Build Trust
accordionSections.summary: Protect data to enhance brand trust.

accordionSections.title: 5. Make Segments Actionable
accordionSections.summary: Use segments in sales and marketing.

accordionSections.title: 7. Target High-Value Customers
accordionSections.summary: Offer exclusive deals to premium users.

accordionSections.title: 9. Fast Segmentation
accordionSections.summary: Optimize big data for faster targeting.

accordionSections.title: 10. Engage the Right Customers
accordionSections.summary: Deliver relevant messages to the right people.

accordionSections.title: 12. Learn from Customer Behavior
accordionSections.summary: Use past data to refine strategies.

1.title: Own Your Customer Data
1.details:
Owning customer data means integrating it into your business processes and creating value from it. Compliance with legal regulations (GDPR, CCPA, etc.) is essential for data security, usage, and processing.

Technical Approach:
‚óè Data Collection: Integrate data from CRM, web traffic, social media, and POS systems.
‚óè Storage: Use a centralized Customer Data Platform (CDP).
‚óè Security: Apply AES-256 encryption and TLS protocols.
‚óè Management: Use data stream tools like Apache Kafka to set up real-time data processing systems.

Tools:
‚óè Salesforce, HubSpot, Segment.io
‚óè Amazon S3, Google Cloud Storage

2.title: Infinite Possibilities
2.details:
With data diversity and flexible segmentation tools, you can create endless combinations in customer segmentation.

Technical Approach:
‚óè Segmentation Data: Age, geographic location, purchase frequency, preferred payment methods.
‚óè Algorithms: Apply K-Means, DBSCAN, or Hierarchical Clustering algorithms.
‚óè Data Visualization: Visualize segments using Tableau or Power BI.

Example Application:
‚óè Offer exclusive discount campaigns by separating new customers from loyal ones.
‚óè Create industry-based segments in B2B sales processes.

3.title: Dynamic Updates
3.details:
Constantly updating segments allows quick responses to changes in customer behavior.

Technical Approach:
‚óè Real-Time Processing: Manage data flow with Apache Spark Streaming or Flink.
‚óè Dynamic Rules: Automatically update segments based on specific behaviors (e.g., no purchase in the last 30 days).
‚óè Machine Learning: Use supervised learning models to make predictions.

Tools:
‚óè Snowflake, Google BigQuery
‚óè Python Scikit-learn library

4.title: Increase Trust
4.details:
Customer data security is critical to brand trustworthiness.

Technical Approach:
‚óè Encryption: AES-256-based data encryption.
‚óè Access Control: Use role-based access control (RBAC) and multi-factor authentication (MFA).
‚óè Data Masking: Anonymize sensitive information.

Tools:
‚óè Okta, Azure Active Directory
‚óè HashiCorp Vault

5.title: Make Segments Functional
5.details:
Integrate your segments into marketing, sales, and customer service processes.

Technical Approach:
‚óè Marketing: Create Google Ads and Meta Ads campaigns specific to segments.
‚óè Sales: Develop segment-specific sales strategies in CRM software.
‚óè Integration: Connect different systems with Zapier or Mulesoft.

Example Scenario:
‚óè Develop a loyalty program for loyal customers and manage it with automated campaigns.

6.title: Send Personalized Emails to Encourage Purchases
6.details:
Personalized emails are an effective way to increase conversion rates.

Technical Approach:
‚óè Dynamic Content: Display information like the user's name, last purchase, or location in the email.
‚óè Segment Integration: Integrate segment data from CRM into the email system.
‚óè Testing: Use A/B testing to determine the most effective content types.

Tools:
‚óè Mailchimp, Klaviyo
‚óè Python Email Automation libraries

7.title: Target High-Value Customers with Discounts
7.details:
Offer exclusive deals to premium customers based on Customer Lifetime Value (CLV).

Technical Approach:
‚óè CLV Calculation: Use RFM (Recency, Frequency, Monetary) analysis model.
‚óè Special Campaigns: Develop a campaign management system integrated with CRM.

Example:
‚óè Offer free shipping and special promotions to high CLV customers.

8.title: Use Segments in Your Marketing Automations
8.details:
Increase efficiency with segment-based marketing automations.

Technical Approach:
‚óè Scheduling: Trigger-based email and SMS deliveries.
‚óè Automation Engines: Use Zapier, ActiveCampaign to manage segment-specific campaigns.

9.title: Fast Segmentation
9.details:
Optimize data processing times to perform fast segmentation on large data sets.

Technical Approach:
‚óè Database Optimization: Use NoSQL (MongoDB) for fast querying of large datasets.
‚óè Parallel Processing: Speed up data processing with tools like Hadoop or Spark.

10.title: Engage with the Right Customers
10.details:
Ensure that segments target the correct customer groups.

Technical Approach:
‚óè Behavior Analysis: Analyze user behavior with Google Analytics.
‚óè Engagement Strategies: Use chatbots to create personalized messages.

11.title: Add Custom Attributes
11.details:
Improve targeting by adding custom metadata to segments.

Technical Approach:
‚óè Custom Fields: Add custom fields to user profiles in CRM.
‚óè Artificial Intelligence: Develop content recommendations tailored to the needs of the segments.

12.title: Learn from Customer Behavior
12.details:
Learn from historical data to optimize future strategies.

Technical Approach:
‚óè Behavioral Analytics: Analyze data with Python Pandas and NumPy.
‚óè Prediction Models: Develop models to predict purchasing habits.
